content: this pattern is a celebration of friendship and love it honors my happy place and chosen home albuquerque also known as duke city where i made so many wonderful friends and feel embraced by a community of artists and makers to publish it as a free pattern right before thanksgiving is perfect a small thank you to you for your friendship the love and the support maybe now you will share some of the love and make these as a gift for your friends and loved ones the pattern gives gauges and stitch count information for various yarn weights and needle sizes - which ones will you choose
